description:
This week's Beano comes with FOUR amazing gifts! There's a Captain Underpants sampler book, Brain Blasterz sweets, a Menace Punch Gun and TMNT trading cards!

There are further treasures to be found inside too!

  • The Bash Street Pups are back in a new run of Pup Parade!
  • Meet Beanotown's newest boyband - No Direction!
  • Find out what three Beano-fans thought of Captain Underpants and the Tyrannical Retaliation of the Turbo Toilet 2000!

And... cast your vote in the latest Beano readers' survey! Tell us what you think and you could win a prize too!

Take the survey now!

Uh-oh! It's almost time to go back to school! Dennis is prepared... with his catapult, super-soaker and whoopee cushion. But what about you?

You can get prepared with the latest jokes, pranks and laughs, such as...

  • Are you too chicken to take on the Menace dice?
  • Will you pass the idiot detector test?
  • More than 700 worth of awesome prizes to be won!

That's not all... you said you wanted him back, and the Editor listened! Yes, BALL BOY takes to the field in a brand new strip! Don't miss the kick-off - get the latest issue of The Beano NOW!

Join Dennis the Menace and Gnasher on the Great School Escape and enjoy 19 awesome comic strip stories in the latest issue of The Beano!

There's loads more inside to help you beat the back to school blues...

  • The little boy with the BIG imagination, Les Pretend is back!
  • Wallace & Gromit come up with a plan to help the donkeys cool down at the beach!
  • There's another edition of Skanky Pigeon by Zoom Rockman!
  • There are 900 pounds worth of prizes to be won!

PLUS... find out more about our brilliant new app! The Dennis and Gnasher Prank Sticker app is available from the Apple store!
